tutorial.lm_phone_audio: LiveMinutes works great on your phone but only a subset of features are available. You can not create new workspace content or edit note on your phone
tutorial.back_to_wp_list_msg: Click 'Back to Desk' to return to your workspace list and create your first workspace.
tutorial.use_lm_case: You can use LiveMinutes from any phone or tablet. Native iPhone and Android apps are on the way
tutorial.lm_description: LiveMinutes lets you organize your team projects in workspaces where you can share documents, notes and videochat in real time.
tutorial.see_others_in_wp: so you'll see if someone else is in the workspace with you.
tutorial.check_wp_feed: Check the workspace feeds to instantly know what happened since your last visit
tutorial.message_chat: Start conversations here and tie your messages to content or people using mentions
tutorial.six_month_active: Your six month free subscription is active!
tutorial.cursor_collaborative: You can also use your cursor as a laser pointer to show things to others
tutorial.load_save_notes_to_ev: Load and save back notes from/to Evernote!
tutorial.lm_note_save_back: Other notes you create in LiveMinutes are saved back to Evernote as well.
tutorial.create_collaborate_notes: Create rich, beautiful notes and collaborate on them with others.
tutorial.lm_mobile: LiveMinutes for mobile is still in Beta. We are working hard on bringing you a great mobile experience. You can help us by reporting any bugs you find!
tutorial.login_msg: Log in on your laptop or tablet for the full experience
tutorial.liveminutes_features: You can upload images, create lists and todos

tutorial.six_month_free: Your six month free subscription is active

confActions.click_start_audio: click here to start your audio

With other browsers, Adobe Flash Player is required.

confActions.msg_everyone: Everyone invited will be able to see and post things to the workspace
confActions.dial_tollfree: Dial in the toll free number
confActions.user_removed: has been removed from the workspace
confActions.noone_picked_phone: Oh no! We called but no one picked up the phone!

confActions.flash_required_msg: Adobe Flash Player is currently required to use video conferencing.

desk.createwp_msg: Créer des projets pour collaborer sur des notes, documents et schémas.
